name: Tiny Midnight Savages
description:
What do you get when you mix up a baby, a day/night cycle, and a well-known professional wrestler? You get copyright infringement a hilarious brawler named Tiny Midnight Savages!

Controls

Movement: WASD/Arrow Keys or Joystick on Gamepad (Xbox 360 Controller Tested)

Attack: Control, left-click, or A on Gamepad (Xbox 360 Controller Tested)

Credits

Programming - Randy Phillips and Chris Winnett
Art - Terry Mosier and James Sirna

Developed for the STL Game Dev Duel Slow Jam 2016.
